title: RHOC Terry Rises + Kyle Richards & Betsy Brandt (The Housewives of the North Pole)
itunes:title: RHOC Terry Rises + Kyle Richards & Betsy Brandt (The Housewives of the North Pole)
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Orange County, which was a thrilling episode that featured a dramatic lawsuit allegation, an Archie appearance, Terry Dubrow getting in the mix, Gina being a rising star, and more! After the recap, D...
description:
Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Orange County, which was a thrilling episode that featured a dramatic lawsuit allegation, an Archie appearance, Terry Dubrow getting in the mix, Gina being a rising star, and more! After the recap, Danny chats with Kyle Richards (The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills) and Betsy Brandt (Breaking Bad) about their new holiday movie The Housewives of the North Pole, which is available now on Peacock! Danny also gets a little tea about the upcoming season of RHOBH, and ties up some loose ends about last season's reunion!


Kyle Richards/Betsy Brandt Interview: 30:46ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
